channel.title: A few 317 questions
channel.description:
Ok does anyone know the class8.java codes for full dagon'hi? if so can you please post.Also if i need the models for it where can i get it?.
Another question how do i add items to pc like for rewards and how do i set the amount of points.
Last Question What do i search for under player.java to set a death spawn point. \
Oh and what and where do i search for maximum amount of players on my server?
Please and Thank You

item.title: A few 317 questions
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

here are class 8 java ints for full dagon’hai

if(i == 8012) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 14117; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 14115; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 14115; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = 14116; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) and also the models come different with sleeves so i might have to redo it class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai top"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A robe worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); // Item Examine } if(i == 8013) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14119; class8.anInt181 = 917; class8.anInt190 = 212; class8.anInt198 = 1883; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 14118; class8.anInt200 = 14118; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A hat worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8014) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 14121; class8.anInt181 = 2083; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14120; class8.anInt200 = 14120; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dagon'hai Robes"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Robes worn by members of the Dagon'hai.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
